home.description: Self-taught Full-Stack software developer from Venezuela, passionate about solving problems through software, mainly focused on Backend development.

description.p1: Web developer passionate about creating functional, fast, and user-centered digital solutions. I am currently part of the OCAM Group team, where I participate in the development and maintenance of web applications that optimize processes and generate real value for the business.
description.p2: With a background from the University Institute of Industrial Administration Technology, I combine solid technical knowledge with a practical approach to deliver high-quality projects in dynamic environments. I specialize in front-end and back-end development, working with modern technologies to build intuitive interfaces and robust systems.
description.p3: I am motivated by solving real-world problems through code, continuous learning, and collaborating in multidisciplinary teams. I am always looking for opportunities to contribute to innovative projects, whether by improving the user experience, optimizing performance, or implementing new functionalities.

skills.title: Arsenal Tech
skills.description: I specialize in a variety of languages, frameworks, and tools that allow me to build robust and scalable applications.
skills.description2: As a Full-Stack developer, I have cultivated a balanced mastery of frontend, backend, and databases, enabling me to handle complete projects from conception to implementation. My stack reflects both production experience and active exploration of modern technologies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations. Whether you have a product idea, want to discuss a role, or simply want to connect, I'd be happy to hear from you. You can reach me this form or <link>LinkedIn</link> — let's talk about what you're building.

actions.unexpected-error: An unexpected error occurred while sending the email.

0.title: Full-Stack Web Programmer Analyst
0.Description: Design and development of customized business solutions for diverse clients, collaborating in the creation of comprehensive systems that optimize organizational processes.

1.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
1.Description: I worked on the development of different projects, as well as the development of a streaming platform and an internal management system, taking full responsibility for the user interface and business logic.

2.title: Web Developer
2.company: Mayor's Office of the Tourist Municipality of El Morro "Lcdo. Diego Bautista Urbaneja"
2.Description: I contributed to the digital modernization of processes by developing internal systems that improved operational efficiency, creating the following systems:<list><listitem>Time and attendance management system.</listitem><listitem>Permit management system for occupying spaces within the municipality, selling alcoholic beverages, and displaying advertising.</listitem></list>
